com.viaoa.jfc.border

Class CustomLineBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • com.viaoa.jfc.border.CustomLineBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.border.Border

    public class CustomLineBorder
extends javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
    Sets a border with specific line widths. For system colors, check out: BasicLookAndFeel.defaultSystemColors
    Author:
    vincevia
    See Also:
